string.text: You have been asked to retrieve a %s. Bring it back to Mangun if you happen to get your hands on one.
I can really use a good set of tools, stalker...and maybe some money. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I am looking for.
I need a %s. It should contain some tools I need to do some work on weapons. If you can bring one back for me I will be grateful, I will even pay you for it...maybe
Cool dude...uh, sorry I can't pay you. I'll give you a good discount though, man!
You have been asked to retrieve a %s. He needs more advanced tools to perform even better upgrades. Bring it back to Mangun if you happen to get your hands on one.
Hey, dude, if you happen to find some more advanced tools I will give you a discount. Will you keep a lookout for me?
I need an %s. It should contain some more tools I need to do some work on weapons. I'll love you like cousin if you can do this for me, dude.
Great...GREAT! Now maybe I can make some damn money. I'm gonna be BIG time, stalker...if I can just get my act together. I don't have much to offer you other then a discount. Sorry, bud.
